Body.Content:
Introduction

We're enhancing threaded channel experiences by extending the thread summarization feature to post/reply channels. This update replaces the Highlights from this conversation option in the More options menu with Summarize Thread, providing a consistent and improved way to generate conversation summaries across all channel types.

When this will happen

General Availability: Rollout will begin in mid-August 2025 and is expected to complete by mid-September 2025.

How this affects your organization

Previously, users could select Highlights from this conversation to summarize posts and replies. This option is now replaced with Summarize Thread, which shows up for conversations with more than 1000 characters. This new option offers a more intuitive and consistent experience across threaded and post/reply channels. The feature is enabled by default on both desktop and mobile and does not require admin configuration.

Figure i. Find the Summarize Thread option in the More Options menu if there are a minimum of 1000 characters in a conversation

Figure ii: Your summary shows up on both desktop and mobile

What you can do to prepare

  • Inform users about the updated summarization option.
  • Update internal training materials or documentation to reflect the new label and functionality.

Compliance considerations

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.
